name: Harboe Pilsner
description: Harboe Pilsner is a non-alcoholic beer with a light, crisp profile, offering the refreshing taste of a traditional pilsner without the alcohol. Ideal for social gatherings, it pairs well with fried food, grilled meats, and savory snacks, making it a great choice for those seeking a non-alcoholic option.

name: Harboe Caribia Ginger Beer
description: Harboe Caribia Ginger Beer a new and fresh reading drink with a sweet but also spicy taste of ginger. The taste fills a lot and gets better and better with each sip. Caribia Ginger Beer does not contain alcohol, but can be drunk alone or as an ingredient in cocktails. Compared to ginger ale, ginger beer is less sweet and more sparkling. For every occasion and celebrations to enjoy the night by yourself or with your friends and family, you’ve come to the right place as we only sell quality, excellence, and more! So come and take this opportunity to buy online Harboe Caribia.

name: Royal
description: The Royal 0.0% product is available in a pack of 24 cans of 0.33l each. It is a non-alcoholic drink that is refreshing and enjoyable. The cans are handy and practical for on the go or for social occasions. With its velvety taste and low alcohol content, this drink is a good alternative for those who prefer non-alcoholic drinks. Ideal for those looking for a refreshing and non-alcoholic option.

name: Benediktiner Weissbier Alkoholfrei
description: Benediktiner Weissbier Alkoholfrei is a refreshing non-alcoholic wheat beer, offering the classic flavors of a Weissbier without the alcohol. This beer is perfect for those who want to enjoy a flavorful beer while staying alcohol-free. The golden color is complemented by a thick, white head. The nose is filled with aromas of banana, clove, and a hint of citrus. On the palate, Benediktiner Weissbier Alkoholfrei delivers the classic wheat beer flavors of banana, clove, and a touch of malt sweetness. The finish is clean and refreshing, making it a perfect choice for any time of day. This beer is ideal for pairing with light dishes such as salads, chicken, and seafood. Benediktiner Weissbier Alkoholfrei is an excellent choice for those who appreciate the taste of a traditional Weissbier while staying alcohol-free.

name: Erdinger Alkoholfrei
description: Erdinger Alkoholfrei is a non-alcoholic wheat beer with a refreshing and full-bodied taste. Its crisp malt and subtle fruity notes make it a perfect choice for fitness-conscious beer lovers.Serve well-chilled for a refreshing experience.

name: NOA - Non-Alcoholic Spirit - Italian amaro
description: Signature Aromas Caramel, Orange, Cinnamon, Chicory, Coriander, Fennel, Star Anise, Gentian. This Italian Amaro hearkens back to a time when craftsmanship was a true testament to patience and precision. Anchored in old-world traditions, it draws inspiration from Averna, a Sicilian spirit cherished through generations. French chicory interlaces the essence with coffee and cola undertones, while an extended orange maceration imparts a distinct, velvety texture. In the aromatic tapestry, roasted spices offer subtle hints of cinnamon and anise, harmoniously intertwined with the signature bitterness of gentian. Optimal Servings: Elegantly on the rocks, garnished with citrus zest. Paired with sparkling water, reminiscent of cola subtly imbued with an orange touch. Perfectly aligned with Espresso & Tonic. Blended with tonic or cola. An adept alternative to Aperol or Italian Bitter, transforming classics like Negroni, Spritz, or Boulevardier from familiar aperitifs to standout digestifs. In the revered style of Amaro Averna. Volume: 700 ml.

name: Gruvi - Alcohol-Free Bubbly Rose - 275ml
description: Gruvi Bubbly Rosé has a refreshing crisp taste and a fruity aroma that blends tart green apple and fresh strawberries. With every bottle, containing only 60 calories and 0.0% alcohol, you can indulge in a guilt-free drink every day. It is gluten-free, sulfite-free, and naturally occurring in sugar. Mix it up by adding muddled figs, honey, and lemon juice to create a zero-proof cocktail that tastes as great as it will make you feel the next day. This sparkling rosé is perfect for charcuterie night, poolside sipping, afternoon happy hours, and anything chocolate. Enjoy without worrying about your total fat, cholesterol, or sodium intake, while getting 1g of protein and 14g of total carbohydrates.

name: Fin Soda - Aperitivo 250ml
description: Fin Soda Aperitivo is designed to replicate the authentic taste of a classic Italian bitter. It boasts a complex blend of spicy, bark, and citrus aromas, perfect for sipping over ice with a slice of orange from early evening into the night. This beverage contains just 45 calories per serving.

name: NOA - Alcohol-Free Dry Sparkling Wine
description: Aromatic signatureChardonnay, Quince, Apple confit, GrapefruitThought different, our non-alcoholic Dry Sparkling Wine was built up with the grape juice instead of deconstructed by dealcoholization of an alcoholic wine. We developped our tasting profile with the raw material - Chardonnay white grape juice - and built up the finesse of the bubbles and the wine aromatic signature. The illusion is as perfect as your next non-alcoholic Happy Hour.Best servedVery cold in a champagne flute or a coupe. Format : 250 ml

name: Field House Brewing Co. Dry Goods Non-Alcoholic Pilsner 355ml
description: Refreshing and classic. A crisp everyday beer with subtle depth of flavour.

name: Field House Brewing Co. Dry Goods Non-Alcoholic Grapefruit IPA 355ml
description: Dry Goods Grapefruit IPA is a vibrant non-alcoholic IPA bursting with fresh grapefruit zest and tropical hops. Juicy citrus leads into light sweetness and a dry, pithy finish. Golden orange, softly hazy, crisp and refreshing.

name: Field House Brewing Co. Dry Goods Non-Alcoholic West Coast IPA 355ml
description: Dry Goods West Coast IPA is a bright, hop-forward non-alcoholic IPA bursting with citrus peel, pine, and resin. Grapefruit and orange sit over a dry golden malt base for a crisp, clean finish. Bold West Coast hops, <0.5% ABV.

name: Noon Gun The General Non-Alcoholic Ipa Beer
description: The General is Noon Gun’s 18-Pounder Session IPA (India Pale Ale) alcohol-free beer twin. Brewed the same way, born the same way. Thus far, no one has been able to tell the difference between the sibling variants. Awarded Double Gold at the Aurora International Taste Challenge.

name: Noughty Rouge Syrah Non-Alcoholic Wine
description: Noughty Rouge Shiraz De-Alcoholised Wine combines red fruit flavours with a little spice, upheld by elegant texture, silky tannins and well-balanced acidity.

name: Absolute Zero Dry Non-Alcoholic Sparkling Wine
description: Absolute Zero Dry is a delicious non-alcoholic champagne with tiny festive bubbles, crisp tropical flavours on the palate and well balanced with a smooth finish. After vinification this premium sparkling wine was de-alcoholised with the latest spinning cone technology.

name: Altina CELEBRATE Sparkling Brut Non-Alcoholic 750ml
description: Pop the cork and Celebrate! ALTINA Sparkling Brut is crafted in the style of a Sparkling Brut Chardonnay. With top notes of Native Australian Peach and strawberry, supported by a bright acidity and toasty vanilla notes. ALTINA gently remove the alcohol from premium Australian wine and blend it with health-giving botanicals to create a complex, delicious non-alc. experience. Pairs Perfectly with a grilled prawn and citrus salad, smoked salmon canapes, grilled vegetable platter or spinach and feta stuff mushrooms. ALTINA Sparkling Brut adds a touch of elegance and festivity, making it the perfect accompaniment to celebrations with friends, outdoor picnics, weddings and birthday parties. IngredientsDe-Alcoholised wine, filtered water, natural botanical flavours, extracts and distillates,preservatives (220, 202), citric acid, malic acid, sodium citrate.This premium de-alcoholised wine product contains less than 0.02% ABV, a level similarto natural fruit juices.

name: Altina CELEBRATE Sparkling Rose Non-Alcoholic 750ml
description: Pop the cork and Celebrate! ALTINA Sparkling Rosé is crafted with layered notes of bright crunchy fruit, tart native Rosella and a hint of citrus. Crisp, lively bubbles with a dry finish. Pop the cork and Celebrate! ALTINA gently remove the alcohol from premium Australian wine and blend it with health-giving botanicals to create a complex, delicious non-alc. experience. Pairs perfectly with salmon and avocado tartare, prosciutto-wrapped grilled asparagus and grilled vegetable galette or something sweeter like a summer berry salad, raspberry macarons or strawberry shortcake. ALTINA Sparkling Rosé adds a touch of sophistication and festivity, making it the perfect accompaniment to a Sunday brunch, bridal and baby showers or a summer garden party. Ingredients: De-Alcoholised wine, filtered water, natural botanical flavours, extracts and distillates, preservatives (220, 202), citric acid, malic acid, sodium citrate. Allergens: sulphites, capsaicinThis premium de-alcoholised wine product contains less than 0.02% ABV, a level similar to natural fruit juices. name: Altina Le Vie En Rose - Non-Alcoholic Wine Alternative
description: Delicate and crisp rose style bubbles with notes of Hibiscus, native Rosella and Rose petals. The palette is balanced with vibrant Citrus undertones to deliver a natural acidity and a fine creamy texture. The finish is dry and refreshing with lingering flavours of tart Apple and Roses. Vegan, Gluten Free. Ingredients: Filtered water, infusion of Apple and organic hibiscus flowers, natural extract of organic pink rose petals, sweet orange peel and native rosella flowers, natural extract of organic Cayenne Pepper, potassium sorbate. Per 100ml: Energy 86kJ (20Cal), Carbs 2.0g, Sugars 2.0g, Sodium 8mg. No alcohol content (0.0% ABV) About Altina Drinks: Our process starts with specially chosen air-dried botanicals that are then cold steeped for a minimum of 36 hours. We do this without the use of sugar syrup or alcohol, both of which can overpower delicate flavours and affect mouthfeel. We then triple filter out any impurities to maximise taste and visual clarity. Our alcohol-free drinks may contain small amounts of natural sugars however unlike our competitors we never ever add any cane sugar or grape juice concentrate to our products. SOLD AS: 4 x 250ml

name: Altina Liberate Collection - Non-Alcoholic Wine - 3 x 750ml

A refreshing bouquet of just- ripe strawberry and subtle pink rose. A crisp, dry finish, with a hint of spice. Pair with: Goats cheese and fig salad, crispy golden potatoes, fresh grilled fish and prawns or a thin crust Italian pizza. FINGER LIME SAUVIGNON BLANC The perfect blend of premium de-alcoholised Sauvignon Blanc and Native Australian Finger Lime. Bright aroma of white nectarine and fresh cucumber. A crisp, lingering finish underpinned with herbaceous notes. Pair with: Sage butter roast chicken, creamy smoked salmon risotto, freshly shucked oysters or a burrata salad. PEPPERBERRY SHIRAZ The perfect blend of premium de-alcoholised Shiraz and Native Australian Pepperberry. Bursting with juicy red fruits and a hint of dark chocolate. A dry, smooth finish, with notes of vanilla and layered lingering spice. Pair with: Chargrilled steak and roast vegetables, slow cooked ragù pappardelle or a selection of sharp, full flavoured cheeses. Non-alcoholic (Less than 0.5% ABV) | No added sugar | Vegan, gluten free | Handcrafted in Australia SOLD AS: 1 x 750ml KAKADU PLUM ROSÉ, 1 x FINGER LIME SAUVIGNON BLANC, 1 x PEPPERBERRY SHIRAZ
